alert.note: Alert for Laurel; Pulaski; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 11:07PM EDT until June 26 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN LAUREL...NORTHEASTERN PULASKI...SOUTHERN JACKSON AND ROCKCASTLE COUNTIES... At 1107 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Roundstone, or near Mount Vernon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Goochland around 1115 PM EDT. Cooksburg around 1120 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dango, Middlefork, Cornelius and Green Hill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
